#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
void fact(int n){
	int arr[2000];
	arr[0]=1;
	int carry=0,k=0;
	for(int j=2;j<=n;j++){
		carry=0;
		for(int i=0;i<=k;i++){
			int c=arr[i]*j+carry;
			arr[i]=c%10;
			carry=c/10;
		}
		if(carry>0){
			while(carry){
				arr[++k]=carry%10;
				carry=carry/10;
			}
		}
	}
	for(int i=k;i>=0;i--){
		printf("%d",arr[i]);
	}
	printf("\n");
}
int main(){
	int t,n;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		scanf("%d",&n);
		fact(n);
	}
	return 0;
}
